TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
Hermes Deep Space Probe not showing up anywhere ?

Edit- I have it in sandbox but not career and all is unlocked.

i had the same problem...but i had interstellar mod installed so that tech tree does not have a "Largeprobes" node try editing the *.cfg required tech to something else see if that works...i edited mine to "start" so i have them at the start of the career for testing

Hermes Deep Space Probe not showing up anywhere ?

Edit- I have it in sandbox but not career and all is unlocked.

All probes from largesProbe node are now advUnmanned node.

Congratulations. However, could you check the Valkyrie pod? It has animation lag. Again... I'll check 1.2.1 (I found it in 1.2), but I suspect it'll remain.

I forgot to fix that issue. Now lag must be gone.

New update: DOWNLOAD LH_LandersProbes_v1.2.2
Any chance of a curse transfer? Nice new probes, I like the look (does kerbniks antennas retract/expand?)

Yes, they do. Also, I think that Munar Orbiter should be just a bit smaller, to fit under 1.25m fairing of Atlas-Agena from FASA.

Edited May 24, 2014 by Guest

The new probes look nice. Maybe add Scansat compatibility to the Munar Orbiter though. I'd love to see a Surveyor lander to accompany the Lunar Orbiter-analogue. Frizzank only has one or two more parts on the docket before he stops expanding FASA and the Surveyor isn't one of them.
Why do you want a curse transfer darth when a mediafire one is supplied

Any chance of a curse transfer? Nice new probes, I like the look (does kerbniks antennas retract/expand?)

I'm not very keen on Curse. Just give me time to think about it and see if it worthes it.

Yes, they do. Also, I think that Munar Orbiter should be just a bit smaller, to fit under 1.25m fairing of Atlas-Agena from FASA.

I asked myself if it was too big or not. Try to add the line

rescaleFactor = 1
The new probes look nice. Maybe add Scansat compatibility to the Munar Orbiter though. I'd love to see a Surveyor lander to accompany the Lunar Orbiter-analogue. Frizzank only has one or two more parts on the docket before he stops expanding FASA and the Surveyor isn't one of them.

Surveyor is planed, as Cassini-Huygens and other famous probes.
Rescale factor is already set to 1 on the Munar Orbiter.
Wait, yogui, can you add a hotfix to the ESA pack to make the flags transparent?

Wait, yogui, can you add a hotfix to the ESA pack to make the flags transparent?

I'll add it, as soon as I can get the ESA pack v0.7.

I still working on the rovers update (Pandora rover is done, Prometheus got some issues to be fixed), I'm working on a Venera probe replica (pics soon). Icarus new parts need to be polished before a release (hope soon).

- ESA pack v0.7

- MEM v3.2

- Space Battle Cruiser v0.3

If you have one of these mods, could you give me a link to download them or send them to me by email (PM me for email). Thanks.

i landed on eve everything went fine until i exited the game and came today the lander was gone no warning no nothing just gone also when legs are deployed and you time warp (non physics) the legs reset to retracted
